params.name: model
params.description: The Hugging Face model ID to be used for inference. This can be a path or model identifier from the Hugging Face model hub.

params.name: token
params.description: Token used by the Hugging Face API for authentication.If not provided, the class will use the token stored in the Hugging Face CLI configuration.

params.name: max_tokens
params.description: The maximum number of tokens allowed in the output.

params.name: timeout
params.description: Timeout for the API request, in seconds.
